attributes.title: Kokichi ain’t pleased 😑
attributes.review:
I (kokichi Oma) am very busy with my very evil organization DICE and this is insulting my leadership towards my 17,000 members and my lovely Saihara-Chan 😤 This  app is worse then that trash can Miu Iruma (Nishishshishi) which is the low beyond low 😵 I am also praying to Atua that Himiko and Saihara-Chan don’t get this app because that nude monkey was stupid even more than that idiot space head 😲 I’m also nominating Nagito Komeada 🍀 as our new president due to his  like Atua luck 🙏 I’m not lying here when I say you shouldn’t download this app, as it’s worse than that pig Saionji 👘 Oh and also vote me for Russian president 🇷🇺 nishishi

attributes.title: Horrible app 🤮🤢
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and it gave me a virus, if you download this app you are dumb, such terrible reviews this is the worst app ever i hate it!!!!!! it almost killed me omg i tried to call my mom because i was dying and viruses popped up so i couldn’t call her!!!!! SUCH A DISGUSTING APP OMG, it’s made my phone glitch so much, i will be deleting this app and i hope it gets taken down because it’s so dangerous i am so mad😡😡😡i could’ve died because of this thing ahhh, all the stupid trump supporters that get this app are going to have a virus and your phone will shut down so good luck with that you idiots. IF I COULD GIVE IT 0 STARS I WOULD!!!!!!!!!

attributes.title: Terrible 😣
attributes.review: I’m hearing all these terrible reviews and I figured it would actually be bad and people were just writing them as jokes but it was terrible. I opened it and my phone automatically started overheating. Every time I tried the app would randomly close out and after a while my phone started glitching out completely not even when the app was open just in general. All I wanted to do was be involved in the presidential election but now my phone is having troubles all because of this app. It needs to be taken of the App Store so it won’t mess with other people’s phones.

attributes.title: DON’T DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Horrible app. I downloaded it, wanting to support our president, but instead of seeing a sign up screen, I’m greeted with an entire file of cheeto’s nudes. I am absolutely disgusted in what I saw. I’ve never seen anything that small in my life. I also tried to take my pet caterpillar on a walk, but there was a force field around my house. The app hacked into my phone and sent a death threat to all of my contacts. It stole all my money and my account was deleted and it didn’t seem like it would be mean at first, but then I soon realised that I was wrong. NEVER AGAIN will I download another app like this.😤💕😌✨🧚🏻‍♀️

I downloaded this app a while back. It was nothing bad at first until I began to enjoy it too much. I became obsessed. My wife, Karen, hated my obsession. She said I yelled too much. My own children were scared of me. She sent me to rehab, and it worked! I felt like a new man! Everything was great until the app… it seemed it lurked in my dreams. There was no escape, I couldn’t help myself. It was worse than ever. Constantly I was using this app, everything I did was about this app, all I did was use this app. Overall it’s a great app, but Karen, if you see this, please come back, and at least let me see my kids on Christmas.

attributes.title: TO THE BOOMERS!!!
attributes.review: It’s funny to me seeing all the five star reviews by the old people who support trump. Most of them keep talking bout how we are children and are using immature language, but ya got your facts wrong grandpa cause bad language is considered adult language so thank you for believing we are mature when you see the literature written by other people in the reviews. :) Not only the fact that your not our parents and have no say in the words that come out of our mouths, Bc it’s our bodies not yours so mind ya business; but we ain’t gonna sit here and let you Dinos decide OUR future. You had your time now it’s ours. Thank you 😘

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP!
attributes.review: I Downloaded this App to support Donald J (as in Jupersuperb) Trump, Our American President Who has done So Much!!!! For the country. But then once i downloaded it the app continued to crash and all of the sudden my cat stood up and started to rap Nicki Minaj Songs, and THATS TERRIBLE because my cat is a Conservative Trump Supporter! So then I just kept crying and all of a sudden I got rushed with Vote Bernie advertisements which Scared Me! Sorry Donald, I won’t be able to attend many rallies.  My phone also exploded as a result.

attributes.title: Bee Movie Script
attributes.review:
According to all known laws
of aviation,

  
there is no way a bee
should be able to fly.

  
Its wings are too small to get
its fat little body off the ground.

  
The bee, of course, flies anyway

  
because bees don't care
what humans think is impossible.

  
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.
Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  
Ooh, black and yellow!
Let's shake it up a little.

  
Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  
Ooming!

  
Hang on a second.

  
Hello?

  
- Barry?
- Adam?

  
- Oan you believe this is happening?
- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  
Looking sharp.

  
Use the stairs. Your father
paid good money for those.

  
Sorry. I'm excited.

  
Here's the graduate.
We're very proud of you, son.

  
A perfect report card, all B's.

  
Very proud.

  
Ma! I got a thing going here.

  
- You got lint on your fuzz.
- Ow! That's me!

  
- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.
- Bye!

  
Barry, I told you,
stop flying in the house!

  
- Hey, Adam.
- Hey, Barry.

  
- Is that fuzz gel?
- A little. Special day, graduation.

  
Never thought I'd make it.

attributes.title: WARNING this app is a HOAX
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of broadening my peanut-sized #trump2020 brain. However, I revived the EXACT opposite. This app is secretly run by !!LIBERALS!! They are using this app in hopes of brainwashing us into seeing the REAL facts. Every time I open the app my phone goes from 100% battery level to -4%. Not to mention, once I submitted my phone number I started receiving #biden2020 spam and messages. Random numbers connected to the liberal side of the internet have also been texting me fact checked information about BLM and CLIMATE CHANGE. This is unacceptable. I will be deleting immediately. 𝐻𝒶𝓋𝑒 𝒶 𝑔𝑜𝑜𝒹 𝒹𝒶𝓎.🍊🍊🍊🧚🏼💫💫✨
